      • getCollection

        public com.mongodb.client.MongoCollection<org.bson.Document> getCollection(com.mongodb.MongoClient client)
        It returns MongoCollection with selected collection name(Default: statistics).It set when initialize MongoDb.
        Parameters:
        client - Get a MongoClient which is set "localhost", 27017.
        Returns:
        collection : Default: initialize statistics collection. You can set when create MongoDb(//here).

      • save

        public boolean save(java.lang.String dateStr,
                    java.lang.String word,
                    int frequency)
        It insert to mongoDb which is selected date-word-frequency
        Specified by:
        save in interface com.galaksiya.newsObserver.database.Database
        Parameters:
        dateStr - Date which will be search.
        word - Word which will be search.
        frequency - Frequency of a word.
        Returns:
        true:if process has been successfully done. false: If it fault.
        See Also:

      • fetchMain

        private int fetchMain(org.bson.Document find,
                      org.bson.Document sort,
                      int limit)
        All fetch function uses this and this is query creator.
        Parameters:
        find - : document creator of find query
        sort - : document creator of sort query
        limit - : It limits size of data which will be printed
        Returns:
        -1 : fault | result is bigger than "0" it is success
